products.title: Sophie Sea Green Roman Blind
products.description: Sail away on a sea of green into the most calming, relaxing haven imaginable. Thats what youll be getting when you add this beautiful sophie sea green roman blind to your window. That lovely, duck-eggy colour and lots and lots of texture will make your home feel fresh and in sail away on a sea of green into the most calming, relaxing haven imaginable.

products.title: William Morris Willow Bough Vine Roman Blind
products.description: Bright and beautiful, this willow bough vine roman blind adds a vivacious touch to any window it adorns. Part of their william morris range, in collaboration with the v&a, the willow was one of morriss favourite motifs, and its one you can find in several of his designs.

products.title: Nova, Lime - Roman Blind
products.description: In vibrant, fruity green, the nova lime is a bold and dazzling piece that will liven up any room. The bright hue contrasts nicely with the softness of the texturing, making for a stylish and innovative blind. Inject a sense of fun into a child's bedroom by combining the lime with playful, illustrated wallpapers in complementary colours such as navy and cobalt blues or lemon yellows and zingy oranges.

products.title: Kent, Kiwi - Roman Blind
products.description: Luscious in lime, the kent kiwi mixes a light, appetising hue with a deep pile fabric with a gorgeous chenille feel. The thick yet lightweight cloth, lined with a protective polycotton sateen, folds neatly into gentle drapes to form a perfect roman blind. Add a calming softness to the spare bedroom by centring your decor around the kiwi. Keep things light and airy by sticking to white walls and white and lime bedlinen and cushions.

products.title: Kent, Green - Roman Blind
products.description: A rich forest green, the kent green combines indoor luxury with outdoor hues. The deep feel and soft texture of the chenille-like cloth adds a gentle shimmer to this dark colour as the light hits it from different directions. Combined with the sumptuous layers of the roman blind style, this is a plush piece indeed. Dress your dining room in old-fashioned splendour by blending the green amongst patterned wallpaper, dark mahogany furniture, and cream accents.

products.title: Hexham Pistachio Roman Blind - Standard Lining
products.description: A plain background with sewn dots across the whole of the fabric. Available in other colours. Hexham pistachio roman blind - standard lining available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.

products.title: Keswick Pistachio Roman Blind - Standard Lining
products.description: A plain lightly textured fabric which has a sheen finish. A lovely fabric to brighten up a room. Available in other colours. Keswick pistachio roman blind - standard lining available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.

Fabric lining: ivory poly cotton lining as standard, white blackout lining and interlining available. Fixings: fixing brackets included. Headrail: robust aluminium headrail, 30mm wide x 43mm deep.
